lead_paragraph: Two television journalists and their three children died when an airstrike by the military coalition led by Saudi Arabia hit their house in Sana.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Airstrike Kills Family in Capital
headline.main: Yemen: Airstrike Kills Family in Capital

snippet: Two television journalists and their three children died when an airstrike by the military coalition led by Saudi Arabia hit their house in Sana.
abstract: Television journalists Suaad Hujaira and her husband Muneer Alhakami, along with their three children, are killed in Sana, Yemen, when coalition military airstrike led by Saudi Arabia hits their house; human rights groups have accused coalition of killing hundreds of civilians in indiscriminate airstrikes.
